    • depleteRunes

      public boolean depleteRunes(int value)
      Depletes runes by a given value only if the result is still positive
      Parameters:
      value - potential number of runes to be taken
      Returns:
      true if result is positive, false if not

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpAction getPickUpAction(Actor actor)
      Create and return an action to pick the runes up from the ground. The runes value of the Runes picked up wll be added to the runes in an actor's possession.
      Overrides:
      getPickUpAction in class Item
      Returns:
      a new PickUpItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • getDropAction

      public DropAction getDropAction(Actor actor)
      Runes will only be dropped when an actor holding onto them is killed. Runes dropped will now belong to nobody(null).

      It will return null unless actor has died.

      Overrides:
      getDropAction in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - actor that has possession of the runes object
      Returns:
      a new DropItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • setRunesValue

      public boolean setRunesValue(int value)
      Sets new number of runes, which must be positive.
      Parameters:
      value - new number of runes
      Returns:
      true if new value is greater than 0, false if not

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation(Location location)
      Sets the location where a dead actor dropped its runes.
      Parameters:
      location - location of dropped runes

    • getDroppedLocation

      public Location getDroppedLocation()
      Returns the location on the game map where runes was dropped.
